title: Living Water in a World Where It's Hard to Know What to Think and Who to Follow
description: John 7 reveals the level of confusion and conflict in the culture war Jesus was embedded in. It isn't that different from our own except perhaps ours is less violent. Jesus offers us someone to follow.
